channel.title: Plz help with runing cilent
channel.description:
could some one help me when ever i try to run cilents i download an error shows up saying
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
plz help me im new.

item.title: Plz help with runing cilent
item.dc:creator: @Zuno Zuno
item.description:
@Zuno wrote:

Guys, you have an error in your PATH and CLASSPATH env. variables. Follow this:

“PATH” Error
Start>My Computer(Rightclick)>Properties>Advanced>Environment Variables
If you havent renamed “path” to “PATH” do it now and then edit it and paste this link in replace of the old text:
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_(your version_)\bin
Replace (yourversion) with your version of java. My version is: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin which is the newest update.

“CLASSPATH” Error
Start>My Computer(Rightclick)>Properties>Advanced>Environment Variables
edit it and replace its old text with:
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_(yourversion)\bin
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_(your version_)\bin
Replace (yourversion) with your version of java. My version is: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin which is the newest update.
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 05, 2008, 02:55:10 PM[/size][hr]Guys, you have an error in your PATH and CLASSPATH env. variables. Follow this:

“PATH” Error
Start>My Computer(Rightclick)>Properties>Advanced>Environment Variables
If you havent renamed “path” to “PATH” do it now and then edit it and paste this link in replace of the old text:
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_(your version_)\bin
Replace (yourversion) with your version of java. My version is: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin which is the newest update.

“CLASSPATH” Error
Start>My Computer(Rightclick)>Properties>Advanced>Environment Variables
edit it and replace its old text with:
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_(yourversion)\bin
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_(your version_)\bin
Replace (yourversion) with your version of java. My version is: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin which is the newest update.
